page.title: 17LIFE STYLES-ARMTHORPE CHILD
page.content: I am{14 years}old and I go to Armthorpe Comprehensive{School.}I enjoy lessons except Latin.The level of discipline is acceptable to me.I would like to have a career in languages. Armthorpe is a{pleasant village}to live in and has more to offer someone of my age than the town.We have the leisure centre and I also enjoy the youth club,dancing and riding. The{shops}I frequent are Chelsea Girl and Top Shop and I think Â£3.50 is about the right amount of{pocket money for someone of my age. I can understand why some people can be persuaded to take{drugs}but I think they are stupid.There is too much {vandalism}in this village.The{violence around doesn't frighten me too much bescause you learn to avoid the likely places for it.
